item.title: Beatrix the Monolith
item.author: Author
item.description: Beatrix is a half-orc Gray Watchman Warden. In the Radiant Gaia setting, half-orcs are raised on stories of the heroism and valor of their orc ancestors, and Beatrix aspires to this. She believes strongly in the value of law and order, and had a promising career in the city watch before she had to give it up in order to pay off a gambling debt her lousy brother had built up.
